STATE v. CARTER. No. COA06-102. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed December 5, 2006. Certification Date December 27, 2006. Appeal from Mecklenburg (04CRS206017, 04CRS209203, 04CRS209204, 04CRS209205, 04CRS209206, 04CRS209208, 04CRS13398).

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
